mapper.insert: insert into logged_record (user_id, corp_id) values ( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) on duplicate key update logged_time = #{loggedTime},time = time + 1
mapper.select: select count(*) from logged_record where corp_id = #{corpId} and date(logged_time) = date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)
